Package adwin

Class ExponentialHistogram

java.lang.Object
adwin.ExponentialHistogram
public class ExponentialHistogram extends Object
The class implements an object that presents the exponential histogram.

    • ExponentialHistogram

      public ExponentialHistogram(int maxBins, int sizeOfBin)
      The constructor creates new FlowMessage object from given parameters.
      Parameters:
      maxBins - int value that presents the maximum number of bins.
      sizeOfBin - int value that presents the maximum size of bin.

  • Method Details

    • addNewValue

      public void addNewValue(double value)
      The method adds new value to the exponential histogram.
      Parameters:
      value - double value that presents the input.

    • addNewValue

      public void addNewValue(TotalVariance current, int index)
      The method adds new TotalVariance to the exponential histogram.
      Parameters:
      current - TotalVariance object that presents total and variance.
      index - int value that presents the index of the bin inside the exponential histogram.

    • getTotalSize

      public int getTotalSize()
      The method calculates the size of the exponential histogram.
      Returns:
      int value that presents the number of values stored in the exponential histogram.

    • getHistogram

      public LinkedList<HistogramBin> getHistogram()
      The method returns the histogram bins.
      Returns:
      LinkedList<HistogramBin> object that holds all bins of the exponential histogram.
